short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a burst of joy to any webpage with a single click, turning your screen into a fun confetti celebration whenever you need it!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring a little joy to your day with Confetti Cannon: Page Party! 

With just a click on the extension icon, your screen will burst into a colorful confetti celebration. Whether you’re marking a milestone, sharing good news, or just want to add some fun to your browsing, Page Party is here to help you celebrate in style. 

It’s a simple, delightful way to brighten up any webpage. Just click and let the confetti fly!


Built on Manifest v3
Page Party is built using the latest Chrome extension technology, ensuring a smooth, secure, and up-to-date experience.

Free & Privacy-Friendly
Page Party is completely free to use and respects your privacy. We don’t collect any personal data—just pure, confetti-filled fun!



Built by Coffee & Fun LLC
